page.title: 17LIFESTYLE IN TICKHILL
page.content: Tickhill is not very varied in its {fashion}of dress.There are a few mods about who dress in long khaki coloured coats,tight jeans and boots.Quite a lot of adults go around in sunglasses, designer{clothes}and drive posh cars. Most of us wear tight,bleached or grey jeans and jumpers.At the moment white jackets and trousers are the "cool" look for boys.Girls wear long,straight or short skirts as well as jeans depending on the occasion.We all listen to{pop music}whether it is on television,radio,records or cassettes. On Saturdays most of us go into town either to buy things or just to have a look around.Sunday is the most boring day of the week because hardly anywhere is open.People often go to visit their relatives on a Sunday as it is a day off for most people.
